title: Ticket #4696: disable non blocking condor_q in stable series
description: The new non-blocking condor_q protocol can take a very, very long time to finish, often minutes in the CHTC pool. We suspect other pools may have the same problem. While #4594 will fix the problem, we should disable this in the stable series until it does. Also, we'll up the default number of condor_q workers to eight.
remarks:
2014-Nov-06 10:20:57 by johnkn:
CODE REVIEW: looks good. note this also disables V3 query in devel series, which is what we want for now.
check_ins:

2014-Nov-04 11:09   Check-in [41575]: Disable the condor_q V3 protocol by default in the stable series #4696 Also up the number of schedd forked workers from 3 to 8 Also put the schedd forked worker knob into the param table (By Greg Thain )
creator: gthain
